meanings.sent1: The tree in our backyard is unyoung.
meanings.sent2: She felt unyoung when she couldn't keep up with the kids.
meanings.sent3: The old cat tried to act unyoung by chasing a butterfly.
meanings.sent4: His unyoung mind was filled with wisdom beyond his years.
meanings.sent5: The unyoung oak tree stood tall and wise in the forest.

meanings.sent1: The building looked unyoung with its peeling paint.
meanings.sent2: After years of hard work, his face appeared unyoung.
meanings.sent3: The unyoung car struggled to start in the cold morning.
meanings.sent4: Her unyoung spirit shone brightly despite her age.
meanings.sent5: The unyoung house creaked with memories of the past.

meanings.sent1: His unyoung appearance made him seem more serious.
meanings.sent2: The unyoung atmosphere of the library was calming.
meanings.sent3: The unyoung music failed to excite the crowd.
meanings.sent4: Her unyoung energy couldn't match the enthusiasm of the children.
meanings.sent5: The unyoung painting lacked the vibrant colors of youth.
